de.saxsys.mvvmfx.utils.sizebinding

Class SizeBindingsBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.saxsys.mvvmfx.utils.sizebinding.SizeBindingsBuilder

  • public class SizeBindingsBuilder
extends Object
    This class is a helper for binding/unbind the size of two components. It can handle the following component types:
    • Region
    • Control
    • Rectangle
    • ImageView
    Usage example: 
     VBox box = new VBox();
 
 Rectangle rect = new Rectangle();
 
 SizeBindingsBuilder.bindSize().from(box).to(rect);
    Author:
    manuel.mauky
